name: Ext_R4_TestScript_se_ac_as_response
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.TestScript.setup.action.assert.response for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents TestScript.setup.action.assert.response from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TestScript|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable
element.definition: `TestScript.setup.action.assert.response` maps to R5 `TestScript.setup.action.assert.response`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: okay | created | noContent | notModified | bad | forbidden | notFound | methodNotAllowed | conflict | gone | preconditionFailed | unprocessable
element.definition: `TestScript.setup.action.assert.response` maps to R5 `TestScript.setup.action.assert.response`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The type of response code to use for assertion.
